reviews.review: Another great film from the MCU.  I seen it twice.  Cried both times.  All I can say is that I am never disappointed with the MCU.
The movie, The action, the humor, the superheros coming together to stop an evil conquering warlord from space and the cliffhanger awesometacular and the best
This movie was amazing and split up the cast very well , and will shock you for sure.

Is good. After 18 other films building to Infinity War, it does a masterful job of coordinating all the characters and pushing each story forward. An invested person will get a lot out of this film...and it would be fascinating to be able to watch this film through the eyes of someone completely fresh to the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

Avengers: Infinity War manages to live up to ten years worth of hype, perfectly balancing an unprecedented number of characters, while having the audacity to introduce and develop an entirely new villain. Marvel Studios, along with The Russo Brothers have delivered a cinematic thrill ride with real stakes for the characters, a brilliant villain and some top-notch action. Avengers: Infinity War is one of the most exhilarating, emotional and satisfying cinema experiences of all-time and I can guarantee that fans of the Marvel Cinematic Universe won't be left disappointed.
citizen kane had a good run, but infinity war blows it away.
this movie was so bad i had the score of Pacific Rim stuck in my head during the fight scenes. thanos, who abused gamora from childhood, "loved" her? i call bs

This movie was fantastic. The reason it works so well is because most of the world building and character develop was already done in previous movies. This means we do not need to waste time introducing everything and everyone. We get straight into the action and it does not stop. I loved all of our heroes' parts especially how they integrated Dr. Strange and Spiderman.
Some of the humor was a bit much, but did not de-rail any of the scenes. I also thought some of the acting on a few characters dragged out and were overdone. Again, it did not really bother too much.

It's a exceptional movie, non stop action and laughs. I would say Marvel has really out done themselves and made quite the tribute to one of the most amazing, shocking, and impactful comic book arcs. Definitely a movie to see especially if you're a diehard Marvel fan.
Can't wait for the next part
